meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 記念する、追悼する

examples.translation: 私は友人たちの記憶を記念する。

etymology.value: ラテン語の「com-」（共に）+「memoro」（思い出す、記憶する）に由来。

verb_forms.present_active_indicative: commemorō, commemorās, commemorat, commemorāmus, commemorātis, commemorant
verb_forms.imperfect_active_indicative: commemorābam, commemorābās, commemorābat, commemorābāmus, commemorābātis, commemorābant
verb_forms.future_active_indicative: commemorābō, commemorābis, commemorābit, commemorābimus, commemorābitis, commemorābunt
verb_forms.perfect_active_indicative: commemorāvī, commemorāvistī, commemorāvit, commemorāvimus, commemorāvistis, commemorāvērunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active_indicative: commemorāveram, commemorāverās, commemorāverat, commemorāverāmus, commemorāverātis, commemorāverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active_indicative: commemorāverō, commemorāveris, commemorāverit, commemorāverimus, commemorāveritis, commemorāverint
verb_forms.present_passive_indicative: commemoror, commemorāris, commemorātur, commemorāmur, commemorāminī, commemorantur
verb_forms.imperfect_passive_indicative: commemorābar, commemorābāris, commemorābātur, commemorābāmur, commemorābāminī, commemorābantur
verb_forms.future_passive_indicative: commemorābor, commemorāberis, commemorābitur, commemorābimur, commemorābiminī, commemorābuntur
verb_forms.perfect_passive_indicative: commemorātus sum, commemorātus es, commemorātus est, commemorātī sumus, commemorātī estis, commemorātī sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_passive_indicative: commemorātus eram, commemorātus erās, commemorātus erat, commemorātī erāmus, commemorātī eratis, commemorātī erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_passive_indicative: commemorātus erō, commemorātus eris, commemorātus erit, commemorātī erimus, commemorātī eritis, commemorātī erunt
verb_forms.present_active_subjunctive: commemorem, commemores, commemoret, commemoremus, commemoretis, commemorent
verb_forms.imperfect_active_subjunctive: commemorārem, commemorārēs, commemorāret, commemorārēmus, commemorārētis, commemorārent
verb_forms.perfect_active_subjunctive: commemorāverim, commemorāveris, commemorāverit, commemorāverimus, commemorāveritis, commemorāverint
verb_forms.pluperfect_active_subjunctive: commemorāvissem, commemorāvissēs, commemorāvisset, commemorāvissēmus, commemorāvissētis, commemorāvissent
verb_forms.present_passive_subjunctive: commemorer, commemorēris, commemoretur, commemoremur, commemoremīni, commemorentur
verb_forms.imperfect_passive_subjunctive: commemorārer, commemorārēris, commemorārētur, commemorārēmur, commemorārēminī, commemorārentur
verb_forms.perfect_passive_subjunctive: commemorātus sim, commemorātus sīs, commemorātus sit, commemorātī sīmus, commemorātī sītis, commemorātī sint
verb_forms.pluperfect_passive_subjunctive: commemorātus essem, commemorātus essēs, commemorātus esset, commemorātī essēmus, commemorātī essētis, commemorātī essent

usage_notes.explanation: 「commemoro」は古典ラテン語の動詞で、主に文章や演説において、過去の出来事や人物を思い起こし、記念したり、追悼したりする際に用いられます。現代の英語や他の言語における「commemorate」の語源となっています。

derivatives: commemorativus (形容詞: 記念の、追悼の)

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin word, so readability is not applicable in the same way as for English. Understanding requires knowledge of Latin grammar and vocabulary.

example_sentences.translation: 著者はその出来事を記念する。
